1.content: Are you male or female
1.title: Gender

info.brief_description: You go to sleep as a human, but when you wake up everyone is an anthro.
info.description:
You go to sleep as a human, but when you wake up everyone is an anthro. But you need to be careful because most people have developed powers, including you!

All powers must be vore related
No death
Sex is allowed but no gay stuff
Try to keep the spelling good
